message: Jokhon Shangbadik Petano Ekti Riti Hoe Dariai_ Shagor-runir moto Shangbadik Er Hottar Por Jokhon Prodhan Montri Bolen Amra Karo Bedroom Er Nirapotta Dite Parbo Na. Jokhon ekjon Shorashtro Montri Shahrukh Khan Er Concart a Gie Matite Boshe Hat Tali Den. Jokhon Felani, Bishojit Er Hottai Manobota Kade Na. Desher Gonotontro jokhon Kichu Manusher Kache Shudhumatro Entertainment Entertainment and Entertainment. shonali bank k jokhon dudoke jete hoi. ekti padma shetur ashai jokhon promotta noditi e shukie jete thake. charidike jokhon aj kalo beraler jhak. shoto manush k midear shamne guli kore arleo sheta gonohotta hoi na. shongbad maddhom gulo jokhon bondi ibrahim kardir vumikai. jonogon nirjatito. 95 vag muslim er deshe jokhon nastik er hungkar. manobota jokhon bridho vikkuk. nobbo jaheliat er ei shomoi Ar ekti Bodor E to Kangkhito Bijoi ene dite pare. Allah Amader Shahajjo korun. amra apnr shenadol. desh ke jaheliat mukto korbo. bijoi dekhe charbo. _RAIAN SAADAT . FARIDPUR
